name: A Quiet Flowerbed
description:
A Quiet Flowerbed

The plague that took your family... your mother... your father... your dog.

Flowers can save them.

So flowers you must farm.

In A Quiet Flowerbed, you play to save your family - your mom, dad, and dog. All three have been turned to stone by an evil plague.  A bouquet of 12 flowers can bring them back. This is a calm farming game that comes with very few stressors.

Weed your garden to gain points. Ghosts help you automate the process.

Plant flowers using your points. Careful: the more flowers you buy, the more expensive they become.

Water your flowers to make them ripe for the harvest. Cloud trees will periodically rain on your flowers.

Autos - like Cloud Trees and Planter Golems - will help you reach your goal of 3 bouquets.
